pr_title: 6761 Don't display device ID under accounts.

timeline.message: Don't display device ID under accounts.

timeline.bodyText: Should we be getting all attributes and looking for any that start with TSK_PHONE_* ? There is some Perl module that parses the db of phone numbers which could cause, for example, TSK_PHONE_HOME , TSK_PHONE_OFFICE.
timeline.author: kellykelly3

replies.bodyText: We could. I'm not sure those would ever realistically show up in a call log but it might be good to check for that case.
replies.author: APriestman

replies.bodyText: Oh you are correct, that is probably more of a contact thing.  Strike my comment.  :-)
replies.author: kellykelly3
